incident.message: The Google Play store has a policy that limits usage of MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE

Mismatched tags: the `d()` and `isLoggable()` calls typically should pass the same tag: `"Database"` versus `"Database"`
Modifier parameter should be the first optional parameter

incident.message: This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 26. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to `LogUtils` which has field `context` pointing to `Context`); this is a memory leak
Consider also using `StorageManager#getAllocatableBytes` and `allocateBytes` which will consider clearable cached data
